summary: When the girl of a rebelious teenage couple finds out she is being sent away, they both believe escaping the rigid order suffocating them is the only way to be free. But is it?
cast: Virginie Ledoyen|Cyprien Fouquet|László Szabó|Jean-Pierre Darroussin|Dominique Faysse|Smaïl Mekki|Jackie Berroyer|Jean-Christophe Bouvet|Ilona Györi|Renée Amzallag|Jérôme Simonin|Laetitia Lemerle|Alexandra Yonnet|Caroline Doron|Laetitia Giraud|Marguerite Vial|Julien Legros|Mathieu Mardoukhaev|Louis Barnier|Djamel Bensalah|Ludovic Berthillot|Vladimir Cagnolari|Anne-Lise Calvez|Lorànt Deutsch|Mathias Grandidier|Leila Guérémy|Laurent Jacquet|Christophe Loir|Yann Richard|Romuald Rodriguez-Lopez|Aurélie Sabatier
title: L'eau froide
